name: Grigor Narekatsi
subtitle: Armenian poet, theologian and saint
bio: One of the greatest Armenian theologians and poets, author of the 'Book of Lamentations', saint of the Armenian Apostolic Church.

name: Mesrop Mashtots
subtitle: Creator of the Armenian alphabet, saint
bio: Armenian enlightener, monk and linguist, creator of the Armenian alphabet and church figure, canonized as a saint.

name: Sahak Partev
subtitle: Catholicos of All Armenians
bio: Catholicos of the Armenian Apostolic Church (387â€“436), a prominent figure who played a major role in strengthening Christianity and developing Armenian culture.
